mutants.code:
def calculate_minimal_expression_value(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, A) = case
        best = A[1]
        worst = A[0]
        for i in range(1, N):
            newbest = best
            newworst = worst
            newbest = max(newbest, best + A[i])
            newbest = max(newbest, worst + A[i])
            newbest = max(newbest, best - A[i])
            newbest = max(newbest, worst - A[i])
            newbest = max(newbest, best * A[i])
            newbest = max(newbest, worst * A[i])
            newworst = min(newworst, worst + A[i])
            newworst = min(newworst, best + A[i])
            newworst = min(newworst, worst - A[i])
            newworst = min(newworst, best - A[i])
            newworst = min(newworst, worst * A[i])
            newworst = min(newworst, best * A[i])
            best = newbest
            worst = newworst
        results.append(worst)
    return results

    results = []

        (N, A) = case

            newworst = min(newworst, best * A[i])
            best = newbest
            worst = newworst
        results.append(worst)
    return results
